Experience.descEducation: During my studies at the university, I became interested in computer science and started learning various CMS platforms, HTML, CSS, and JS.
Experience.descFrontend: While deepening my knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JS, I discovered React. Its component-based approach allowed me to build more organized and efficient web applications, setting them apart from traditional websites.
Experience.descBackend: Recognizing the need to use the backend in my projects, I delved into PHP and Python to solve various backend tasks while ensuring seamless integration with the frontend.
Experience.descReact: Transitioning to freelance, my tech stack evolved to include React, Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind, Prisma, and MongoDB. I'm open to full-time opportunities and willing to relocate for the right role.
